title: FS - Graded T207, mostly difficult cards.
author: frohme

posts.post_title: FS - Graded T207, mostly difficult cards.
posts.post_content:
A few difficult T207's for sale.  Asks are below, open to offers on one/multiples. Click on thumbnail to get a larger image.

[STRIKE]Red Nelson - Broadleaf - SGC 30 - $175[/STRIKE] - sold
[STRIKE]Chief Wilson - Broadleaf - SGC 40 - $225[STRIKE] - sold
[STRIKE]Works - Anonymous Fac 25 - SGC 30 - $165[/STRIKE] - sold
[STRIKE]Lange, Cycle - SGC 35 - $225[/STRIKE] - sold

Schaefer- Recruit 606 - PSA  6 - $150
Kling - Recruit 606 - PSA 3 - $75
